caption.p: The chemical structures of the tested phytochemicals, their synthetic analogs, and antidiarrheal antibiotics. 1. berberine chloride, 2. sanguinarine chloride, 3. 8-hydroxyquinoline, 4. chloroxine, 5. nitroxoline, 6. ferron, 7. zinc pyrithione, 8. salicylic acid, 9. bismuth subsalicylate, 10. tannic acid, 11. ceftriaxone sodium, 12. ciprofloxacin, 13. metronidazole, 14. vancomycin hydrochloride, 15. chloramphenicol, 16. tetracycline.
